alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 5:44PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN WEBER...NORTHWESTERN WASATCH...SALT LAKE...EASTERN DAVIS...SOUTHERN MORGAN...WESTERN SUMMIT...NORTHWESTERN UTAH AND EAST CENTRAL TOOELE COUNTIES... At 544 PM MST...an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Morgan to Emigration Canyon to Bluffdale...and moving east at 20 mph. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Layton, Murray, Bountiful, Tooele, Farmington, Park City, Morgan, Coalville, Hill Air Force Base, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights and Clearfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 286 and 337. Interstate 84 between mile markers 85 and 119. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 98 and 176. US Route 40 between mile markers 0 and 8. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
